amendment.description: Amendment increases funding (by offset) for surface transportation security by $15.676 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce funds for the Office of the Under Secretary for Management by $15,676,000 and increase funds for Transportation Security Administration Surface Transportation Security by $15,676,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lynch amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
